name: Tiki Ball
description:
This is TIKI BALL, a 2 players sports game. 

Take the ball and smash it onto your rivals goal. The fist one to score 3 points wins!

  • PLAY AS A TIKI WITH YOUR FRIENDS: this is a local multiplayer game for 2 players.
  • USE EVERYTHING TO YOUR ADVANTAGE: throw lightning strikes to your rivals, protect yourself with shields and avoid the deadly bananas.
  • BE CAREFUL WHERE YOU STEP: Warning! Falling bombs will appear throughout the game.

This game was made in 3 months using Unity.

Game Made by Dani Riwez : Twitter - Instagram

Music and SFX by Urs Bollhalder : Web

Character Designs by Karma Juliana : Instagram
